name: Awakened Shrub
description: The Awakened Shrub resembles an ordinary shrub with twitching leaves and branches, animated by magic. It can blend seamlessly into its environment, making it a clever ambusher.
memorable: Despite its humble appearance, the Awakened Shrub can serve as a clever distraction or trap for unwary adventurers, showcasing its unique False Appearance ability.
goals: Often created as sentinels or guardians to defend gardens and forests, it follows simple commands.
relations: Frequently created by druids or wizards and may be found alongside other plants and nature-aligned creatures.
environment: Commonly found in gardens, forests, or areas cared for by druids.
strengths: Can blend into its environment to surprise intruders and has resistance to certain conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which is especially damaging to it.
attacks: Uses Rake for a melee attack dealing minimal slashing damage; can also annoy foes using the Thorn ability.
most_powerful_ability: False Appearance allows it to remain motionless, making it indistinguishable from a normal shrub.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 10, reflecting average awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Capable of understanding one language known by its creator but cannot communicate verbally.
Resistant to exhaustion and conditions like paralysis and petrification, enhancing its durability.
Low challenge rating of 0 indicates it poses minimal threat.
Often serves as a minor threat for low-level encounters.
Mimics appearance of a normal shrub for ambush tactics.
